settings.text: A blog about your smile, our planet, and daily changes that add up.

settings.heading: The early years
settings.description: After all, you may be wondering, what exactly is clean beauty? How can I know if an ingredient in my hair care or skincare product really is clean? Are there benefits to seeking clean ingredients, or is this greenwashing all over again? we want to do better. That means asking ourselves every day, ‟How we can improve?”
